ROAD WORK, OLD SONOITA HIGHWAY - APPROXIMATELY SIX MILES, THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 18, THROUGH TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 4, 2025 - Flaggers and pilot car operation will be on site to direct, monitor and control traffic movements through the construction zone.  Due to the work area limitations, turn movements within the project limits may be restricted during this work.  Minor delays and lane closures may also occur.  Please approach the area with caution, obey all traffic control devices and allow for extra travel time.
